verbose_text: Binding of cyanide to the ferric ion in cytochrome oxidase a3 inhibits the terminal enzyme in the respiratory chain and halts electron transport and oxidative phosphorylation (XREF_FIG) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ferric ion in cytochrome oxidase a3 inhibits the terminal enzyme in the respiratory chain and halts electron transport and oxidative phosphorylation
